      Page(int maxSize, java.lang.String path)
      Create a new page specifying the maximum number of records it can hold and the path at which the page will be stored relative to the executable files

      • Page

        public Page(int maxSize,
            java.lang.String path)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new page specifying the maximum number of records it can hold and the path at which the page will be stored relative to the executable files
        Parameters:
        maxSize - the maximum number of records that fit in one page
        path - the path at which the page is stored relative to the executable files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
